text:
Need Morgan Morris for Pillow Talk campaign. Budget around $15,424, looking for 1 x Facebook post, 2 x Instagram reel, 1 x 2-minute tutorial, 1 x Media interview. 3 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 10 months. Engagement period: 5 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $15,424 budget

Need to confirm: deliverables
